display_html: type family EntropySize (n :: Nat) :: Nat where ...
name: EntropySize

display_html: type family MnemonicWords (n :: Nat) :: Nat where ...
name: MnemonicWords

display_html: type ValidEntropySize (n :: Nat) = (KnownNat n, NatWithinBound Int n, Elem n (96 ': (128 ': (160 ': (192 ': (224 ': (256 ': ([] :: [Nat]))))))))
name: ValidEntropySize

display_html: type ValidChecksumSize (ent :: Nat) (csz :: Nat) = (KnownNat csz, NatWithinBound Int csz, Elem csz (3 ': (4 ': (5 ': (6 ': (7 ': (8 ': ([] :: [Nat]))))))), CheckSumBits ent ~ csz)
name: ValidChecksumSize

display_html: type ConsistentEntropy (ent :: Nat) (mw :: Nat) (csz :: Nat) = (ValidEntropySize ent, ValidChecksumSize ent csz, ValidMnemonicSentence mw, MnemonicWords ent ~ mw)
name: ConsistentEntropy

display_html: type family CheckSumBits (n :: Nat) :: Nat where ...
name: CheckSumBits

}

display_html: newtype ApiMnemonicT (sizes :: [Nat]) (purpose :: Symbol) = ApiMnemonicT (Passphrase purpose, [Text])
name: ApiMnemonicT ApiMnemonicT

display_html: type Api t = Addresses t :<|> (Wallets :<|> Transactions t)
name: Api

display_html: type ListAddresses t = "wallets" :> (Capture "walletId" (ApiT WalletId) :> ("addresses" :> (QueryParam "state" (ApiT AddressState) :> Get '[JSON] [ApiAddress t])))
name: ListAddresses

display_html: type DeleteWallet = "wallets" :> (Capture "walletId" (ApiT WalletId) :> DeleteNoContent '[Any] NoContent)
name: DeleteWallet

display_html: type PutWalletPassphrase = "wallets" :> (Capture "walletId" (ApiT WalletId) :> ("passphrase" :> (ReqBody '[JSON] WalletPutPassphraseData :> PutNoContent '[Any] NoContent)))
name: PutWalletPassphrase

display_html: type Transactions t = CreateTransaction t :<|> (ListTransactions t :<|> PostTransactionFee t)
name: Transactions

display_html: type CreateTransaction t = "wallets" :> (Capture "walletId" (ApiT WalletId) :> ("transactions" :> (ReqBody '[JSON] (PostTransactionData t) :> PostAccepted '[JSON] (ApiTransaction t))))
name: CreateTransaction

display_html: type ListTransactions t = "wallets" :> (Capture "walletId" (ApiT WalletId) :> ("transactions" :> (QueryParam "start" Iso8601Time :> (QueryParam "end" Iso8601Time :> (QueryParam "order" (ApiT SortOrder) :> Get '[JSON] [ApiTransaction t])))))
name: ListTransactions

display_html: start :: forall t k. (DefineTx t, KeyToAddress t k, k ~ SeqKey, EncodeAddress t, DecodeAddress t, Buildable (ErrValidateSelection t)) => Settings -> Trace IO Text -> Socket -> WalletLayer (SeqState t) t k -> IO ()
name: start
